Is there any way to limit fields selectable?
I need that user can just move ticket stage on 2 specific stage

Hey, not sure if this is the right forum, but I have a feature/component request.

Would love to have a component called something like `<PropertyInputField property="property_internal_name" objectType="deal" />` which would render the type of input for that property. This one would save alot of time & reduce having to rebuild the same thing for every extension.

The use case for this would be when you are in a certain context and want to for example prompt the user to enter a property.

It would just reduce the complexities of implementing owner dropdowns, date pickers, etc. The field does not need to actually update the object itself, but just serve as a helper for the rendering of the field within a form that could use other inputs not tied to properties (Input, Select, NumberInput, DateInput, etc).

Thoughts?

Thanks! :rocket:
